## Software

### Replication template

- [Replication template](https://github.com/hchulkim/replication-template): This is the replication template I use for my empirical papers. This template follows [DCAS](https://datacodestandards.org/), the Data and Code Availability Standard v1.0 and also follows the [Data and Code Availability Policy of the American Economic Association](https://aeaweb.org/journals/data/data-code-policy/).

### Quarto

- Quarto working paper template for Economics: [\[github link\]](https://github.com/hchulkim/econ-paper-template/tree/main) [\[Blog post\]](https://hchulkim.github.io/posts/quarto-paper-template/)

### Scripts

- `Dockerfile` for empirical analysis (`R`, `Python`, `Julia` with dependency management setup): [\[link\]](https://hchulkim.github.io/posts/dockerfile-template/)
